attributes.action: simplify information given at the point of sale, regarding the power consumption and standby consumption of all electrical devices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many electrical devices such as fridges and washing machines use a simple energy rating based on a letter system where A or A+ rated devices consume less power or are more efficient than lower rated devices.  The letter is backed up by hard data regarding expected power use over a given period of time or a cycle of use.  We petition the Prime Minister to legislate that this information should be available for all electrical devices at the point of sale to allow the consumer to make an informed choice.
